name: psychic-gem
effect:
Held
:   When the holder uses a damaging psychic-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging psychic-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A gem with an essence of the mind. When
held, it strengthens the power of a
Psychic-type move only once.
